<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Revivifying Mutagen](/Feats.aspx?ID=5769) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You are under the effects of a mutagen.

</column>

---

You metabolize a mutagen to heal yourself. You regain 1d6 Hit Points for every 2 item levels of the required mutagen (minimum 1d6 HP), but the mutagen's duration immediately ends.
